task.title: Cooking Steak
task.shortdesc: The steps to cook perfect steak are straighforward.

context.p: After bringing your steaks to room temperature, prepare steaks the following way.

step.cmd: Preheat the oven to 375. Place a cast iron skillet in the oven while the oven is preheating and for an additional 10 minutes.
Remove the cast iron skillet from the oven, add a touch of olive oil to the pan, and place the pan on a burner at high heat.
Salt the steaks and add to the cast iron skillet. Sear each side for 3 minutes and then place the pan with the steaeks in the oven to finish cooking.
Removve the steaks from the oven and skillet and let rest for 10 minutes.
Check the temperature of the steaks to ensure proper doneness.
